name: extreme-evoboost
effect: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.
short_effect: Raises all of the user’s stats by two stages.

flavor_text.sun-moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
